PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_ActiveEPResp_t Struct Reference

This command is generated by a remote device in response to an Active_EP_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Active_EP_req command. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address of the active endpoints request.
uint8_t activeEPCount
 Count of active endpoints on the remote device.
uint8_t activeEPList [MAX_ACTIVE_EP_NUMBER]
 List of active endpoint Ids.

Detailed Description

This command is generated by a remote device in response to an Active_EP_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Active_EP_req command.
